Package com.cg.onlinefooddeliverysystem.service

Class DeliverySystem

java.lang.Object
com.cg.onlinefooddeliverysystem.service.DeliverySystem
public class DeliverySystem extends Object
The DeliverySystem class manages customers, delivery personnel, food inventory, and order placement. It provides methods for registration, adding inventory, order processing, and displaying available food items or delivery persons.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Yash Shaw

    • addFoodItem

      public void addFoodItem(FoodItem item, int quantity)
      Adds a food item to the inventory or updates its quantity if it already exists.
      Parameters:
      item - The food item to add or update.
      quantity - The quantity to add.

    • displayMenu

      public void displayMenu()
      Displays the available menu along with quantity for each food item.

    • placeOrder

      public Order placeOrder(Customer c, Map<String,Integer> request) throws InvalidOrderException
      Places an order for a customer based on their food item request.
      Parameters:
      c - The customer placing the order.
      request - A map of food item names to their requested quantities.
      Returns:
      The created Order object.
      Throws:
      InvalidOrderException - If the order cannot be fulfilled.

    • showAllDeliveryPersons

      public void showAllDeliveryPersons()
      Displays the profile of all registered delivery personnel.
